# Introduction to AML course

Welcome to the Advanced Machine Learning course! This course is designed to provide an in-depth understanding of advanced topics in machine learning, including data comprehension techniques, various advanced machine learning methods, optimization approaches, what to watch out when working using each machine learning method, and more. By the end of this course, you will have a solid grasp of machine learning techniques and be able to apply them to real-world problems.

## Introduction to Advanced Machine Learning

In this section, we will cover the basics of advanced machine learning, including an overview of the topics we will explore throughout the course.

## Bayesian Neural Networks

This section will delve into Bayesian neural networks, discussing their principles, advantages, and how to implement them.

## Optimization Approaches

Here, we will explore various optimization techniques used in machine learning, including gradient descent, stochastic optimization, and more.

## Transfer Learning

This section will cover the concept of transfer learning, its applications, and how to leverage pre-trained models for new tasks.

## Advanced Machine Learning Models

We will discuss advanced machine learning models such as ensemble methods, deep reinforcement learning, and more.

## Applications in Actuarial Science

This section will focus on how advanced machine learning techniques can be applied in actuarial science for risk assessment, pricing, and other tasks.

## Applications in Transportation Systems

We will explore the use of machine learning in transportation systems, including traffic prediction, route optimization, and autonomous vehicles.
